briefTitle: Trial to Confirm the Efficacy and Safety of Dasiglucagon in the Treatment of Hypoglycemia in T1DM Children
officialTitle: Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo/Active-controlled, Parallel-arm Trial to Assess Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of Dasiglucagon Relative to Placebo/GlucaGen速 as Rescue Therapy for Severe Hypoglycemia in Children With T1DM Treated With Insulin
summary: A phase 3, randomized, double-blind, placebo- and active-controlled, parallel-arm trial to assess the efficacy, safety, and pharmacokinetics of dasiglucagon relative to placebo and GlucaGen速 when administered as a rescue therapy for severe hypoglycemia in children with type 1 diabetes mellitus (T1DM) treated with insulin
